idea-plugin.name: Jumping Lines
idea-plugin.description:
Jumping Lines is a plugin for JetBrains IDEs that allows you to navigate your code more efficiently by jumping multiple lines at once, saving your time and reducing the strain on your hands.

Features:
  • Jump multiple lines at once.
    Forward:SHIFT+CTRL+PERIOD | Backward:SHIFT+CTRL+COMMA
  • Jump multiple lines at once with selection.
    Forward:SHIFT+ALT+PERIOD | Backward:SHIFT+ALT+COMMA
  • Jump on a middle of editor.
    CTRL+COMMA
  • Replicate cursors on lines cursor jumped over.
    Forward:SHIFT+ALT+QUOTE | Backward:SHIFT+ALT+SEMICOLON
  • Increase Jump score as you jump.
  • Customized number of jumps.
    Plugin settings:ALT+L
  • Works with all JetBrains IDEs.
